name: Defend & Capture
description:
Project Description

Small scale entry level RTS game built on Unity using some custom assets and some unity store assets. Destroy the enemy base to win but defend yours at all costs!

manage resources and buildings to counter the AI who will try to do the same to you! beat their army or die trying!

features a rock paper scissors troop mechanic and base building management:

helicopters < tanks

tanks > infantry

infantry > helicopters

Controls

WASD Q E to move and rotate the camera

SHIFT - mass select troops - drag gold circle over to select

LMB on troops to select them followed by RMB on an area anywhere on the map will make the units head there.

LMB on bases pads will allow you to build buildings on them

LMB on reactors and supply pads will bring up a explosion icon, LMB on that to destroy the building

1 will bring you back to home base location in case you get lost

Unfortunately upgrades are not yet implemented
